name: Super Epic Random Bard Guy
description:
A super scary final boss is throwing musical notes at you!

Press the right buttons at the right time to survive!

As of now the game is really short, it only includes 5 classical songs, 

but I plan on adding more content eventually.

Note:

This is my first game,  I mainly made it to practice programming before university starts. It took an entire week, but I'm happy with the result :)

Any feedback is appreciated
